page.title: 02SOCIAL EVENTS IN RAGLAN
page.content:
{RAGLAN}
Many social events and evening classes take place in the hall of Raglan Junior School which acts as a Community Centre. Some of the groups include:- Raglan United Community Council,Raglan W.I.,Mothers Union, St. Cadoc's Ladies,Raglan Companion(OLP), Mother & Toddler Group, Young Farmers, Baptist Sisterhood,Village Produce Association,Local History Group,Cuckoo Club(social&charity),Paddington Bear Club,Bridge,Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scout s,School of Dancing,Cricket,Football, Rugby,Badminton,Indoor Bowling, Gymnastics and various evening classes. Events are Raglan Day,St. Cadoc's May Fair,Fun Run,Raglan in Bloom,The School Fete & sometimes the Hunt meet.
